extendedIngredients.name: brussels sprouts
extendedIngredients.original: 8 cups halved trimmed fresh Brussels sprouts

extendedIngredients.name: cream
extendedIngredients.original: 1/4 cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat or KNUDSEN Light Sour Cream
extendedIngredients.originalName: BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat or KNUDSEN Light Sour Cream

extendedIngredients.name: lemon zest
extendedIngredients.original: 1 tsp. each lemon zest and juice

title: Lemon-Glazed Brussels Sprouts
summary: The recipe Lemon-Glazed Brussels Sprouts is ready in approximately 25 minutes and is definitely an amazing gluten free and vegetarian option for lovers of Mediterranean food. This recipe serves 4 and costs $1.4 per serving. One portion of this dish contains roughly 6g of protein, 6g of fat, and a total of 141 calories. A mixture of brussels sprouts, lemon zest, grey poupon dijon mustard, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. It works well as a budget friendly side dish. With a spoonacular score of 84%, this dish is tremendous. Try Lemon Glazed Brussels Sprouts, Glazed Brussels Sprouts With Lemon and Pepper, and Lemon & Maple Glazed Roasted Brussels Sprouts for similar recipes.
instructions: Cook Brussels sprouts in boiling water 8 to 10 min. or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, mix remaining ingredients in large bowl.                                            Drain Brussels sprouts.  Add to sour cream mixture; toss to evenly coat.

steps.step: Cook Brussels sprouts in boiling water 8 to 10 min. or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, mix remaining ingredients in large bowl.
Add to sour cream mixture; toss to evenly coat.
